commandsListTooltip:
這個機器人由 %%developer%% 為 Hypixel 翻譯人員社群而開發。這個機器人是完全開源的，其 GitHub 儲存庫可以在[這裡]%%github%%找到。
你可以使用 `+translate` 指令，並跟隨該指令的指示來協助翻譯機器人。

你可以執行 `+help <指令名稱>` 來了解特定指令的用法。
你可以在下面找到所有可用頁面的列表。請按下本訊息下方的反應來切換頁面。
madeBy: 機器人由 %%QkeleQ10%% 開發和維護
timeOut: 這個選單已逾時。如果你要繼續使用它，請再次輸入 `+help`。
staffOnly:
This command is only available to staff and thus, its information is hidden.
Please contact a staff member if you believe this is an error.
inDev: This command is currently in development and will be available at a later date!

help.description: 顯示所有你可使用的指令及關於機器人的其他訊息。

prefix.description: Gives you the appropriate prefix for your language(s). In order to get a custom prefix, execute `+prefix <flags>` and replace `<flags>` with the regional code of your country's flag or its name. You can add as many flags as you wish, separated by a space.

quote.description: Gets (or adds) a funny/weird/wise quote from the server.

mention.description: Mentions a language role with an optional message.

context.description: Gets, adds or edits context for the given string ID. `+context help` shows you information about this command. `+context link` gives you the link to request access to the context spreadsheet.

languagestats.description: Shows you the progress of a language on all the projects we currently support.

issue.description: 開啟我們的 GitHub 議題頁面，你可以在那裡回報問題和發送回饋。

language.description: 更改語言、顯示你目前使用的語言或顯示可用的語言列表。如果你想為機器人請求一個新的語言，請使用 `+language add <新語言>`。

ping.description: 顯示機器人目前的 Ping。

hypixelstats.description: 顯示該使用者的 Hypixel 統計數據。

hypixelverify.description: Links your Discord account with your Hypixel profile. Execute `+hypixelunverify` to unverify yourself.

8ball.description: The Magic 8 Ball that will answer all your questions.

verify.description: Automatically checks for changes on your Crowdin profile and gives you the appropriate roles. If your profile is not stored on our database, you will be asked to send your profile again. Make sure you have DMs enabled from this server so that the bot can send you a message.

tip.description: Gives you a random tip regarding the server.

invite.description: 給予你一個伺服器邀請連結。請在你想要邀請他人時使用此連結。

projects.description: 給予你在伺服器上支援的所有翻譯項目之連結及相關訊息。

hypixel.description: 給予你有關 Hypixel 項目的實用訊息。

guidelines.description: Gives you the link to the official thread regarding Hypixel translations.

quickplay.description: 給予你有關 Quickplay 項目的實用訊息。

skyblockaddons.description: 給予你有關 SkyblockAddons 項目的實用訊息。

translate.description: 給予你有關 Hypixel Translators Bot 項目的實用訊息。

thread.description: Gives you the link to the thread announcing this Discord server.

twitter.description: 給予你 Hypixel Translators Community 的 Twitter 頁面連結。
